278e196b0e60ba730eed90a187f20fba: * 1. Theme/Focus: British Ambassador to Yemen Michael Aron discusses the ongoing conflict and peace efforts in Yemen.

He praises the undeclared truce and hopes it will lead to peace consultations in Sweden. He emphasizes the importance of UN Security Council resolution 2216 as the basis for negotiations and highlights the UK's focus on humanitarian aspects. He warns of the international community's strong reaction if any party fails to participate in the consultations.
